import { useRef } from 'react' import '../css/Classroom.css' import { openClassroom } from '../service/classroom_access_service' import { buildClassSetting } from '../service/class_setting_service' function ClassForm(props) { const classroomWs = props.classroomWs const classroomNameRef = useRef(null) const classroomDescRef = useRef(null) const classroomTimeRef = useRef(null) const startClassHandler = (event) => { event.preventDefault() const classSetting = buildClassSetting(classroomNameRef.current.value) console.log(classroomNameRef.current.value) console.log(classroomDescRef.current.value) console.log(classroomTimeRef.current.value) // openClassroom(classroomWs) } return (

開啟教室：

) } export default ClassForm
